borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2022/03329/FR3 dated 19th July 2023 for the "Redevelopment of the site to provide a Class C3 residential building, ranging in height from 3 to 5 storeys, together with car and cycle parking, hard and soft landscaping, play space, creation of new vehicular access to Farm Lane, removal of existing vehicular access to Farm Lane and other associated works." Amendments sought to install top hung opening windows to ground floor living areas, entrance canopy changed to metal with stippled paint finish, metal capping / structural supports to glazed balustrades, pre-cast banding, entrance panels adjusted to show separate intercom and riser panel, removal of lift motor, cedral cladding to outbuilding, change of play equipment, change compacted gravel to resin bound gravel to north of site, main roof to south to be designed as a green roof.
